task_management.content: Task management workflow requires proper initialization of all components: MLflow tracking server, PostgreSQL database, and knowledge base. Always ensure environment variables are properly set before starting.
MLflow tracking requires PostgreSQL connection string in MLFLOW_POSTGRES_URI environment variable. Default server runs on localhost:5000.
Task execution follows sequential process: request_planning -> get_next_task -> mark_task_done -> approve_task_completion -> repeat until complete -> approve_request_completion
Error handling implements exponential backoff with jitter. Default settings: max_retries=3, backoff_factor=2, jitter=0.1
